column4: Anyone know why I would only be getting 90 FPS with the ati driver (I've tried both the repos one and from their site), with Radeon X300?
90 fps in what?
As reported by xscreensaver.
try doing glxgears -printfps
Interesting.  That says its way higher.
what does it say?
While the gears window is up, 1680.  When minimized and just working with XChat, 6900.
I dont see anything wrong with that
Not at all.  So what might be the issue with the screensavers?
(Which run way slow if I try to preview them while glxgears is up.)
which screensavers are you trying to do?
They seem to all be unhappy.
hmm...
I'm not sure...but we know that it's not a problem with your graphics card
but it might be a problem with your graphics card and xscreensaver
If I close glxgears they get a lot better, but the GL ones are still slower.
Well your graphics card isn't THE best card...
that might be the problem
True.  I guess I'll have to live with that.
but there may be a problem with the xscreensaver
Is there something I should do about it?
I'm assuming you have the drivers installed?
